3. Information  We  Collect
Reply collects information under the direction of its customers and has no direct relationship with the individuals whose Personal Information it processes.
Reply only uses this data for the purpose of fulfilling orders or communicating with you and Reply's partners regarding the Services.

1. Important  Information

Our Privacy Promise: Our server only stores emails you have sent via Reply and any responses you received to those emails, so we can detect replies and you can have access to them from the application.
Our servers only store emails that you have sent via Reply and any responses you have received to those emails so we can detect replies, classify them, and provide access to them in your Reply account.
In particular, we will need to access your inbox folder to detect replies to emails that have been sent via Reply.

We will provide an individual opt-out choice, or opt-in for sensitive data, before we share your data with third parties other than our agents, or before we use it for a purpose other than which it was originally collected or subsequently authorized.
